Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory132.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Are you sure we are not lost?', 4: '2'}
{3: "The Demon King and Liv were heading toward the next Demon General's Castle. Liv was a little concerned with the rapidly changing scenes around them."}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: "Of course. Don't you underestimate the power of Demon King.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Does this have anything to do with power...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: "Instead of worrying about the scenes, let's just hurry. We can't run again if there are enemies nearby. This is the only way to the castle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'Two of us... No, you alone are no match for the guards if there are many of them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I should have told others about the situation...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'Sorry, but the previous heroes of revelation left me a bad impression about you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'Remember when we first met? I was trying to take you with violence.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Um-hum. I was really scared...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: "Regretting won't help us. If your friends are as kind as you are, we will meet again eventually.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Sorry to disappoint you, Demon King.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'Who are you...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It was a red-haired Construct, followed by a male Construct in black. Vera and Camu walked toward them.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Vera, Camu, why are you here... Wait. Are you our enemy?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Liv was glad to meet more of her peers, but she immediately recalled something mentioned by the guards.'}
{3: 'Two heroes had chosen to fight for the King.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'This is a race after all. Of course we will pick the easiest and fastest way.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: 'Just like last time. I was hoping to meet you later. If only I can have the artifact...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'The artifact is in our hands now.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Knowing what the Demon King was thinking, Camu took out a shiny gem fragment. Liv didn't know what it was, but the Demon King immediately recognized that it was the last piece of artifact."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: 'Never thought Karuna would be beaten by you... Holy Maiden, we need to run.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Demon King immediately made a decision. Running was the only option. He must not be caught.'}
{3: 'Liv followed the Demon King and ran back toward where they came from.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Fine. I don't mind a race before everything ends.", 4: '1'}
